can civilization.=A0 Only April.

  ----- Original Message -----

      F-S, I certa=
inly hope I didn't offend you with anything I 
        said.=A0 I certainly=
 do not claim to be a braniac or a know-it-all, 
        as you have called=
 me in your post.

In fact I am saying the 
        opposite: I am saying t=
hat I do not know:=A0 I am saying I do not 
        know how anyone can bel=
ieve these 2012 predictions when all they have is 
        stories and ques=
tionable claims.=A0 I don't know how they can believe 
        this stuff w=
hen they actually DO have evidence that all the similar 
        claims in =
the past have been shown to be false. I do not know why they 
        belie=
ve this claim is any more justified than all the others,

I 
        do not=
 know how the group can say on its home page " It's one thing to 
        b=
e skeptical, it's another to ignore and deny all evidence.", yet it is 
   =
     the people who are certain of the 2012 prophecies that seem to be 
   =
     ignoring and denying evidence that it is only one more in a long line =
of 
        unsupported failed predictions, not those who are skeptical of =

        it.

I do not know how it justifies you referring to me as=A0 a 
 =
       "wanne be brianiacs claiming to know all", when the group home page =

        suggests such attacks get people banned.=A0 I do not know how bein=
g 
        skeptical of a future prophecy makes one a know it all. And I do=
 not 
        know how prompting people to judge for themselves makes me a =
know it 
        all. 

And I don't know why the group home page says a goo=
d 
        argument is ok, yet you start name-calling offended when someone=
 
        questions something you do not agree with, or proposes a theory 
=
        alternate to your own.

So call me ignorant.=A0 Obviously I 
      =
  really don't know very much at all.=A0 

But of the very few 
        thi=
ngs I do know, I now it is good to question, and not take everything, 
    =
    especially prophecies, at face value.=A0 And I know the best way to 
  =
      test a prophecy, and the people making them, is to see if they actual=
ly 
        come to pass.=A0 And I know that since no evidence can support =
a 
        prophecy's truth until it comes to pass, and since all past end-=
of-world 
        prophecies have no evidence of their success, that those =
who think they 
        know something special about why 2012 is different,=
 certainly know more 
        than I.

And so I hope they (or you, if you c=
ount yourself among 
        them) will post your evidence, and your predic=
tions, and your 
        dates.=A0 And we won't have to argue about it.=A0 =
We can just put 
        that person, and their predictions, and their date=
s, on our calendars, 
        and judge when the date comes, who was really=
 acting as a 
        know-it-all.=A0 

One thing I think we can all agree =
on:=A0 
        one knows it all. Not me, not you, and certainly not a coll=
apsed 
        MesoAmerican civilization.

Rj
